item.description:
EVENT: Get your muscles and your metabolism moving, after spending the High Holiday eating and sitting, with an easy, scenic stroll around the pond (actually part of the Charles River reservation) at Cutler Park at 1:30 p.m. The loop is about 1 ½ miles and you can join us for one loop around or two. Bring water or sunscreen as needed. Park is about 1/3 of a mile past the JCC on the left coming down Nahanton Street in Newton. Email TC with questions.

 

Trip's Coordinator: Susan, bostonsusan@aol.com

RSVP: Rsvp to Susan at the address above and she can get back to you with the details

MEET: In the parking lot at 1:30 p.m. The TC will wait 10 to 15 minutes, past the designated meeting time for participants to arrive.

COST: There is a $5 fee for Meetup participants and guests which can be credited toward a full Mosaic membership of $25.
item.how_to_find_us: Send a message to Susan for the details

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Autumn Amble at Cutler Pond
